details.description: Blood flows from the fanged skull rune as if it were an open wound.
details.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:20|name:Exorcise Spirit|traits:complex,haunt] (trained) to exorcise the spirit, @Check[type:religion|dc:21|name:Sever Spiritual Connection|traits:complex,haunt] or @Check[type:occultism|dc:21|name:Sever Spiritual Connection|traits:complex,haunt] (trained) to sever the connection between Hunger's Call and the temple, or @Check[type:crafting|dc:21|name:Break up the Mural|traits:complex,haunt] (trained) to break up the pattern of the mural; three total successes are required to disable the haunt.
details.reset: The mosaic ceases its routine 2 rounds after all living creatures are out of sight of the stairs. After 6 hours the haunt is ready to trigger again.
details.routine: 3 The bloody mosaic blasts shards of colored glass at anyone within 10 feet of the eastern wall, and they each take [[/r {1d10}[slashing]]]{1d10 slashing damage} plus [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true|name:Avoid the Glass Shards|traits:complex,haunt,slashing] save; critical success negates the bleed damage).

description.value:
Trigger A living creature bearing Hunger's Call moves within 30 feet of the exit stairs

Effect Whispering voices fill the triggering creature's mind with a compulsion for blood of the living. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20|name:Resist Hunger's Possession|traits:mental,occult,haunt,complex] save, and the haunt then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1}.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 2}.

Critical Failure The target loses control of their mind and on their next round must move to the nearest ally and make an unarmed bite attack. The ally is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} against this attack. The bite deals [[/r {1d4}[piercing]]] {1d4 piercing damage} and a critical hit deals an additional [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage}. At the end of their turn, the target regains control of their mind.
